basic.Peptide Name: Neutrophil defensin 3 (HANP-3; alpha-defensin; Rodents, mammals, animals)
basic.Target Organism: Gram-positive bacteria:Staphylococcus aureus, Streptococcus pyogenes, Enterococcus faecalis;Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli, Salmonella serotype krefeld, Klebsiella oxytoca, Pseudomonas aeruginosa.Fungi:Candida albicans, Cryptococcus neoformans.
